Description: A module to read IDL 'save' files into pythonHomepage URL: http://astrofrog.github.com/idlsave/IDLSave is a pure python module to import variables
 from IDL 'save' files (e.g. .sav) into python, and does not
require IDL to work. It has a very simple command-line interface, and
converts all IDL variables to python types. Arrays are converted to
Numpy arrays, and Structures are converted to Numpy record arrays.The IDLSave code is now also available in scipy.io.
title: IDLSave
